## SimpleResponse.context property

Optional active contexts which help influence the NLU.

- [https://cloud.google.com/dialogflow/es/docs/contexts-input-output](https://cloud.google.com/dialogflow/es/docs/contexts-input-output) - [https://docs.aws.amazon.com/lex/latest/dg/context-mgmt-active-context.html](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/lex/latest/dg/context-mgmt-active-context.html)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
context?: {
        active?: ActiveContext[];
    };
```
